data.name: Summer Games
data.detailed_description:
Originally released in the 1980s for many home computers and consoles, this classic sports game saw players compete in a wide variety of athletic events. Now, relive those days in this remastered emulated version. Contains the ZX Spectrum, Amstrad CPC, Atari 2600, and Sega Master System versions.

Gameplay

Compete in a number of athletic events, including:
  • Pole vault
  • Diving
  • 4 × 400 m relay
  • 100 m dash
  • Gymnastics
  • Freestyle relay swimming
  • 100 m freestyle swimming
  • Skeet shooting


This enhanced version introduces a number of modern features to this retro classic, including:

  • Saving/loading the game at any point
  • Support for most modern game controllers
  • Full control remapping
  • Image scaling and smoothing options
